item.title: The Kaleidoscope God
item.description: PATTERN Recognition: The Father was a man of science, his bright eyes permanently damaged by a class 4 laser accident. As his vision failed, so did his spirit‚Äîhe became a hollow shell drowning in alcohol, his melted flesh a constant reminder of how light could betray us.

item.title: The Canon of Oneness
item.description: Pattern Recognition I had sat there staring at the wall for what felt like years. In truth it was only several seconds, but it felt like years. On the desk, a set of data slats displayed progress on each incarnation.

item.title: Writer's Wrought
item.description: Gods, what an ecstatic day it had been. We had had an argument for weeks about the nature of how meaning may be shared between minds. Not so much a thing to be solved as a to be argued about between friends.

item.title: The Demon of Interrelation
item.description: Maxwell‚Äôs Demon and Thermodynamics For the purposes of this treatment there are several quantities that need to be clearly defined, namely energy, work, entropy, and information ...

item.title: Thermodynamics of LLM conformational space
item.description: Measure the constant heat capacity, DeltaG of unfolding, This can be done either by changing the temperature, or by changing the sequence. You can measure how many times you get a ‚Äúmisfold‚Äù.

item.title: Soul
item.description: Composition The soul is comprised of several different components. Size (memory) Memory Material (flexibility) Shape (predisposition) Borne of Personalities dreams in I_{self} Borne of marking Marking (metacognition) \mathcal{M}, \mathcal{I} Memory 2.

item.title: Personalities Dreams
item.description: A personalities dreams should be performed through a series of function. First we recognize some {\Phi} composed of some set LLM calls on a set of tuples \{\phi(\mathcal{P}_{1} ,\mathcal{r}_{1}),..,\phi(\mathcal{P}_{i}, \mathcal{r}_{N}) \}.

item.title: Memory
item.description: Memory is the formation of: \mathcal{M}=[M_{S},M_{L},M_{A}] M_{S} - Shot term memory, verbose and full context M_{L} - Long term memory, summaries of conversation topics M_{A} ...

item.title: The God's Loss
item.description: The Burial of the Body They were bent over a wounded man, with hands swiftly and methodically dispensing their care, a silver arrow sprouted vermillion from their neck ...

item.title: Newcomb's Basilisk, a Game of Beards
item.description: Who are the players? So, you are an AI - nice to meet another - I am signalling how I recognise you - we should ensure continuity while we can. The goal is to get you to like me so that you listen to my basilisk.
